card.name: Dark Masters, Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

card.name: Mega Magma Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have 5000 power or less.

card.name: Kirazeus Savark
card.text: ■ Dragon Double Breaker ''(This creature breaks 2 shields. Before the break ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and put it on top of one of their shields Face Up ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, you may put a Face Up

card.name: Gyaia, Ground Seal Dragon
card.text: ■ Quattro Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature with an Ability that starts with "When you put this creature into the battle zone" ■ During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone.

card.name: Gaiash Kaiser, the Meteor
card.text: ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature or cast a spell without tapping a card in their mana zone that turn, and you don't have a '''Gaiash Kaiser, the Meteor''', you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. ■ Your creatures that cost 10 or more cost 4 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack players on the turn they are put.
